title: Change snowfall effect color to red

requirements.summary: Change snowflake gradient colors from white/blue to red tones in the SnowfallBackground component
acceptanceCriteria: Snowflakes in the SnowfallBackground component render with red gradient colors instead of white/blue
The radial gradient maintains the same opacity and structure but uses red color values
The snowfall animation continues to work with the same speed, drift, and particle behavior as before
Both normal and reduced-motion modes continue to function correctly with red snowflakes

file_operations.description: Modify the drawSnowflake function (lines 73-97) to change the radial gradient color stops from white/blue to red. Update line 87 from `rgba(255, 255, 255, ${snowflake.opacity})` to `rgba(255, 0, 0, ${snowflake.opacity})` for the center color. Update line 88 from `rgba(240, 245, 255, ${snowflake.opacity * 0.6})` to `rgba(255, 100, 100, ${snowflake.opacity * 0.6})` for the mid-stop color. Update line 89 from `rgba(240, 245, 255, 0)` to `rgba(255, 100, 100, 0)` for the outer transparent color. Do not modify any other animation logic, particle properties, accessibility features, or canvas rendering infrastructure.
